questionList.analysis:
【解析】考查助动词。句意：圣诞节已经结束了，学校还要一个星期才开学。根据此空后面的not begin可知此处需用助动词。根据全文时态一致原则，可知本句用一般现在时。主语是单数school，助动词用does。故填does。
 分析：短文主要介绍了美国学生在假期中庆祝新年的情况，包括新年前夕的派对和制定新年决心等。人们在派对上跳舞、唱歌，戴着纸帽子，制造噪音，迎接新年的到来。许多年轻人会列出新年决心，希望在新的一年里实现自己的目标，但有些人会忘记自己的决心。
考点：说明文；文化．
点评：根据短文大意和语境选择合适的单词，并用其正确的形式填入空白处，使补全后的短文意思通顺，语法正确，结构完整，注意单词的适当形式。
questionList.dataContent:
[myImgCur]
Students in the United States are still enjoying their holidays.Christmas is over，but school &Num&1____not begin again for another week.Before they return，there is still another important holiday—the first &Num&2____of the New Year.It is the last night of the old year.However，people celebrate the most.
Almost everyone is &Num&3____to a party.It is nice to be with &Num&4____when you say goodbye to the old year.The people at the parties are dancing and singing.Most of them look &Num&5____They are wearing paper hats and making noise.When it is &Num&6____close to midnight，everyone stops to watch the clock.A new year is beginning.Everyone is hoping &Num&7____a very good new year.
For many young Americans，like my English teacher's son and daughter，this is the time of the year to think about the future.They make a list &Num&8____things that they hope to do.They promise to stop smoking，to lose weight，to &Num&9____money or to do something else that is good.They call these promises resolutions.Some people remember their resolutions all year long，&Num&10____many others forget them.

【解析】考查名词复数。句意：当你们和旧的一年说再见时，和朋友在一起很好。根据所给单词和句意，可知此处指"朋友"，且用名词复数表一类。故填friends。

questionList.dataContent:
It's difficult for the parents of every family to teach their children to be responsibleï¼æè´£ä»»çï¼ for housework.
Shiyan Middle School in Zhengzhou is making its students do housework for their parents.Students in Grade 3 must learn how to cook and cleanï¼students in Grade 6 do the laundryï¼and students in Grades 7 and 8 cook balanced meals with 15 yuan.Many parents think it's a good way for children to try houseworkï¼ï¼3ï¼$\underline{\text{ä½æ¯ä»ä»¬ä¸ç¥éå¨å®¶ææ ·åã}}$With the following ideasï¼you really can get your children to help at home.
If you want to make your children think that they can do everything quite rightï¼please don't scoldï¼æ¹è¯ï¼ them but give them lots of praiseï¼èµç¾ï¼ at home.Talk more about what he did rightï¼not about what he didn't do.ï¼4ï¼$\underline{\text{If your child finishes some difficult workï¼give him or her a Sunday trip or a ballgame with parents as a rewardï¼å¥å±ï¼.}}$
